ValidationRule.description: Prevents users from editing Opportunity Products after an Opportunity is Closed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(CONTAINS($User.ProfileId, '00e6g0000027lpb')), OR(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.StageName, "Send to Order Management"), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.StageName, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.StageName, "Closed Lost")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Opportunity Line Items cannot be created or edited because the Opportunity is Closed.
